email.text:
With IC Hack 19 little over a week away, we'll be sending out event information including our Slack channel invitation link soon.
In the meantime, here's a reminder that **CV submissions are open until the end of today**. Our sponsors are looking to recruit from the event for various roles. Submitting your CV will help you **get the most out of IC Hack 19** and build your network.
Make sure to submit yours using [this form](https://goo.gl/forms/tqqDFvMjuYPdqhdC2) before 11:59pm today!

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to let us know by emailing info@ichack.org.
We look forward to seeing you at IC Hack 19!
_- The IC Hack 19 team_
